song.title: Distant Lullaby (emissions#3 chipdisk)
song.info:
"distant lullaby"
for the emissions#3 chipdisk
(heavily downsampled)
a much longer remix upcoming..
one small spinning blue orb
a marble in the ocean of blackness that extends far away beyond reason
far away beyond the swell of brief humanity
far away from home
contact, necrosfm.org
